Title: Scrum Sprint Monitor
Description: Scrum Sprint Monitor provides the Agile team with hands-off, always up-to-date status of the current Sprint, both at the individual and team level. It connects to TFS and is designed to run either on a large LCD screen located in a public area, or as a desktop application.
